import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const sampleInventory = [ { id: 'delica-97', title: '1997 Mitsubishi Delica Space Gear', image: '/images/delica-1997.jpg', status: 'Available', year: 1997, make: 'Mitsubishi', type: 'Van', specs: '2.8L Turbo Diesel | Crystal Lite Roof | 4WD', price: '$16,900', mileage: '122,000 km', }, { id: 'hiace-96', title: '1996 Toyota Hiace Super Custom', image: '/images/hiace-1996.jpg', status: 'Sold', year: 1996, make: 'Toyota', type: 'Van', specs: '3.0L Diesel Turbo | 4WD | Automatic', price: '$14,500', mileage: '138,000 km', }, { id: 'grand-hiace-99', title: '1999 Toyota Grand Hiace', image: '/images/grand_hiace-1999.png', status: 'Available', year: 1999, make: 'Toyota', type: 'Van', specs: '3.4L Gasoline | 4WD | Automatic', price: '$15,800', mileage: '101,000 km', }, { id: 'evo-vi-99', title: '1999 Mitsubishi Evolution VI', image: '/images/evo_vi_gsr-1999.png', status: 'Sold', year: 1999, make: 'Mitsubishi', type: 'Sports Car', specs: '2.0L Turbo Gasoline | 4WD | Manual', price: '$33,000', mileage: '89,000 km', }, ]; export default function VehicleDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); const vehicle = sampleInventory.find((v) => v.id === id); if (!vehicle) { return (

Vehicle not found

← Back to Inventory
); } return (
← Back to Inventory

{vehicle.title}

{vehicle.status}

Specs: {vehicle.specs}

Price: {vehicle.price}

Mileage: {vehicle.mileage}

Year: {vehicle.year}

Make: {vehicle.make}

Type: {vehicle.type}

); }
